pullrequest.title: Add job template deletion to cluster/common.py and cluster/__init__.py

content.raw: Are there any other objects that have an instance of a JobTemplateFactory as an instance? As-in are there different objects representing jobs other than RestartableJob? Those objects would also need to call the `deleteJobTemplate` method of the JobTemplateFactory when those objects are "deleted" as well.
content.html: Are there any other objects that have an instance of a JobTemplateFactory as an instance? As-in are there different objects representing jobs other than RestartableJob? Those objects would also need to call the deleteJobTemplate method of the JobTemplateFactory when those objects are "deleted" as well.
